note.p: Lithographer. A member of the Microscopical Society of London from 1840. Artist who undertook to prepare drawings of objects as seen under the microscope. Probably Samuel William Leonard Williams, known as Samuel William Leonard (1777/7–1873), lithographer and artist, retired from at least 1861, living in south London.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1060/1/4/71/21), 1851 (HO107/1569/198/11), 1861 (RG9/107/10/15), 1871 (RG10/734/142/11)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 August 2022)
